001package src;
002/** 
003 * Main entry point for the POS, which manages orders, inventory, employees, and sales reports for a boba store
004 */
005import java.io.File;
006
007import javafx.application.Application;
008import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
009import javafx.scene.Parent;
010import javafx.scene.Scene;
011import javafx.stage.Stage;
012/**
013 * This class is the main entry point for the application.
014 */
015
016public class Main extends Application {
017
018    /**
019     * Initializes and displays the JavaFX application window.
020     * Loads the login page FXML file and sets up the primary stage.
021     * @param primaryStage - The primary stage for the application
022     * @throws Exception - Throws exception if FXML file cannot be loaded
023     */
024    @Override
025    public void start(Stage primaryStage) throws Exception {
026
027        File fxml = new File("GUI/login_page.fxml");
028        Parent root = FXMLLoader.load(fxml.toURI().toURL());
029
030        primaryStage.setTitle("Bubble Tea POS System");
031        primaryStage.setScene(new Scene(root));
032        primaryStage.show();
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * Main entry point for launching the application.
037     * Initializes and starts the JavaFX application lifecycle.
038     * 
039     * @param args - Command line arguments passed to the application
040     */
041    public static void main(String[] args) {
042        launch(args);
043    }
044}
045
